text: Orbe is a small town in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It was the capital of the former district of Orbe and is now part of the district of Jura-Nord vaudois. The town is on the river of the same name. About 6,000 people live there. The town has a coffee factory owned by Nestlé, a marionette museum, Roman ruins, and a late-Gothic church. == References == == Other websites == * * Switzerland Tourism information * * * * Orbe-Boscéaz (timetable of the Gallo- Roman villa) * Fondation Pro Urba Category:Municipalities in Jura-Nord vaudois Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Orbe
